content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position(43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 43.0, -82.0) with current fuel {'coal': 7} and processing {'iron-ore': 1} resulting in {'iron-plate': 25}

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have all required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, you need 3 iron plates and 3 iron gear wheels to craft a Burner Mining Drill, and you currently have only 1 iron plate and 1 iron gear wheel.

### Errors when crafting Stone Furnace
- Ensure you have enough stone in your inventory to craft a Stone Furnace. You need 5 stones, and you had only 10 stones when the error occurred.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when inserting items into the Stone Furnace
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the Stone Furnace. For instance, you encountered an error when trying to insert iron ore but had none available.

### Errors related to insufficient coal in the Stone Furnace
- Regularly check the coal levels in the Stone Furnace to ensure it has enough fuel to operate. If coal levels are low, prioritize harvesting more coal.
